document_data.name: ''Reptilian Scale Mail''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Reptilian scale mail''''' was a set of enchanted [[scale armor]] made out of an unfortunate [[lizardfolk]]'s hide.
document_data.Powers: ''Reptilian scale mail'' was a set of tanned and cured scale armor crafted out of a lizardfolk's hide. The armor was masterfully made and gave the wearer improved defense only slightly hindering their ability to cast ''[[spell]]s''.
document_data.History: A set of ''reptilian scale mail'' could be found in a locked and trapped chest within the [[Dwarven Dungeons]]' Main Halls in [[1369 DR]]. The armor was crafted by one of the tribes of [[orc]]s or [[orog]]s who feuded with the [[sorcerer]] [[Malgi Hi]]'s lizardfolk tribe in the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]].
